column4: I'm confused. I'm trying to backup this box to my test box using rsync.  From my test box I run rsync thisbox:/home/me /home/me, but the files end up in /home/me/me, on the test box!?
never tried rsync myself, but try adding trailing slashes to those paths (so /home/me/)
ok, I'll give it a try, thanks.
the trailing / was the trick, thanks man!
